[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
- When spending [BulletPropellantAlly], activate the above effect once more

1051201.name: Tiantui Star's Blade [天退星刀]
1051201.desc:
When this unit has [BulletPropellantAlly]:
- At 1+ [BulletPropellantAlly], convert all Coins of 'Tanglecleaver' into [SuperCoin]s
- Skill Coins that spend [BulletPropellantAlly] gain +1 Power (activates only as long as the Coin has Rounds left to spend)

When this unit has [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly]:
- At 1+ [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly], convert all Coins of this unit's Base Attack Skills to [SuperCoin]s
- At 0 [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly], convert all Coins of this unit's Base Attack Skills that spend 'Unique Ammo' to [SuperCoin]s
- Skill Coins that spend [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly] gain +2 Power (activates only as long as the Coin has Rounds left to spend)

1051202.name: Chachihu [揷翅虎]
1051202.desc:
Always Active: begin Encounters with 12 [BulletPropellantAlly]

When flipping a Coin that consumes [BulletPropellantAlly] or [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly]: while not having those 'Unique Ammo' does not cancel this unit's attacks, the Coin's On Hit "inflict [Combustion]" and "inflict [Combustion] Count" effects do not activate

If this unit equipped Defense Skills for the first time in this Encounter, or if this unit spent all of his [BulletPropellantAlly], or if this unit is Staggered: at the end of that turn, reload 8 [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly] and gain 1 [IrritationAlly] (once per Encounter)
- If this effect activates while this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger (unless it's a forced Stagger)
- Remove all [BulletPropellantAlly] if this unit has any leftover [BulletPropellantAlly]
- At 8+ (sum of [BulletPropellantAlly] and [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly] spent), convert [IrritationAlly] to [HugeIrritationAlly]

When this unit uses a Base Attack Skill that spends the final Round of [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly]...
- Gain Atk Weight +2 before attacking
- Gain 1 [BeastEyesAlly] next turn

1051211.name: Tiantui Star's Blade [天退星刀]
1051211.desc:
When this unit has [BulletPropellantAlly]:
- At 1+ [BulletPropellantAlly], convert all Coins of 'Tanglecleaver' into [SuperCoin]s
- Skill Coins that spend [BulletPropellantAlly] gain +1 Power and deal +10% damage (activates only as long as the Coin has Rounds left to spend)

When this unit has [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly]:
- At 1+ [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly], convert all Coins of this unit's Base Attack Skills to [SuperCoin]s
- At 0 [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly], convert all Coins of this unit's Base Attack Skills that spend 'Unique Ammo' to [SuperCoin]s
- Skill Coins that spend [BulletPropellantSpecialAlly] gain +2 Power, deal +30% damage, and inflict +2 more [Combustion] Potency and [Combustion] Count On Hit with those Coins (activates only as long as the Coin has Rounds left to spend)

1051221.name: Savage Tiger's Lunge
1051221.desc:
When 1 ally with the fastest Speed uses a Skill that spends [Bullet], if their Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, deal +(Speed difference × 2)% more damage (max 10%).
(This effect does not activate if the affected unit lacks the [Bullet] buff entirely. However, it will activate if they have the [Bullet] buff, even if they have 0 rounds left)

1051231.name: Savage Tiger's Lunge
1051231.desc:
When 1 ally with the fastest Speed uses a Skill that spends [Bullet], if their Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, deal +(Speed difference × 3)% more damage (max 15%).
(This effect does not activate if the affected unit lacks the [Bullet] buff entirely. However, it will activate if they have the [Bullet] buff, even if they have 0 rounds left)

notes.short: Consumes ammo ({status:BulletPropellantAlly}) with his skills. At 0 ammo, on stagger, or when using a defense skill, expends all ammo and reloads a stronger ammo variation ({status:BulletPropellantSpecialAlly}), buffing all skills and converting S3 to S3-2. Also gets a speed, damage, and {status:Vibration} application buff ({status:IrritationAlly}) on reload, which gets upgraded after spending 8 cumulative ammo. The attack that spends the last stack of the stronger ammo gains atk weight and gives him {status:BeastEyesAlly} next turn, which reduces clash power but gives protection and more damage at low HP depending on the total ammo spent.
notes.full:
His skills all have relatively straightforward {status:Combustion} and {status:Vibration} effects with {status:VibrationExplosion}s on his S2 and both S3s. and a {status:Switch_Vibration} into {status:VibrationIgnition} (bonus {keyword:Wrath} damage based on the average of {status:Combustion} and {status:Vibration} Potencies on {status:VibrationExplosion}) on both his S3s. His main mechanics are his ammo effects and passive buffs.

He starts the battle with 12 {status:BulletPropellantAlly} which are consumed by all his attack skills (1 ammo for S1, 2 for S2, and 3 for both S3s). Unlike older ammo ids, he doesn't cancel his remaining coins if he runs out of ammo, they just don't get the additional buffs his ammo provides and stops inflicting {status:Combustion}. All coins that expend this ammo get +1 Power and deal +10% damage. When he runs out of {status:BulletPropellantAlly}, he reloads 8 stacks of {status:BulletPropellantSpecialAlly}, which is a stronger variation, giving affected coins +2 Power, +30% damage, and +2 {status:Combustion} Potency and Count application, as well as converting all coins on all his skills into {status:SuperCoin}s and replacing his S3 with S3-2, giving it 5 instead of 3 {status:SuperCoin}s (still consuming 3 ammo). He can be forced to load {status:BulletPropellantSpecialAlly} sooner by defending or by getting staggered, but this exhausts all of his regular ammo. If he's forced to reload due to stagger, he automatically recovers from the stagger.

When he loads {status:BulletPropellantSpecialAlly} he also gains {status:IrritationAlly} which gives him more speed, damage based on speed difference, and bonus {status:Vibration} application. It's upgraded to {status:HugeIrritationAlly} which is just a stronger variant when he consumes 8 or more ammo in total (of either type).

When using his last {status:BulletPropellantSpecialAlly}, the skill that uses the last stack gains +2 atk weight and he gains {status:BeastEyesAlly} on the next turn, which reduces his Clash Power by 1 for every 2 ammo he spent during the fight for a total of -10 Clash Power if he managed to spend all 12 {status:BulletPropellantAlly} and 8 {status:BulletPropellantSpecialAlly}. The coins on his skills that don't spend ammo also lose their {status:SuperCoin} status. In return he gains buffs depending on how much total ammo he spent. At 8+ ammo spent, he gets {status:Protection} every turn for every 10% HP missing (max 5 at half life). At 14+ ammo spent, his {status:SuperCoin}s deal more damage based on missing HP% when he loses clashes. At 20 ammo spent, he deals even more damage based on the difference between his missing HP% and his target's missing HP%.
